events.name: Brighton & Hove Albion at Norwich City

headlines.description: Brighton & Hove Albion beat Norwich City 1-0 at Carrow Road on Saturday.
headlines.shortLinkText: Norwich relegation worries deepen with defeat to Brighton

headlines.description: Jamie Vardy scored his 100th Premier League goal as Leicester notched their first victory since the league resumed, beating Crystal Palace 3-0.
headlines.shortLinkText: Leicester City beat Palace to boost UCL chances

headlines.description: Manchester United momentarily moved into the top four following an entertaining 5-2 victory over relegation-threatened Bournemouth.

video.headline: Greenwood made 'huge statement' in Man United's win

tracking.trackingName: INET_SOC EPL Analysis (Greenwood made 'huge statement' in Man United's win) 2020/7/4 Global

headlines.shortLinkText: Utd hammer Bournemouth to move into top 4

headlines.description: Arsenal's Bukayo Saka celebrated signing a new contract with the club by scoring his first Premier League goal in their 2-0 win over Wolves.

tracking.trackingName: INET_SOC EPL Analysis (Arsenal's back-to-back away wins 'surprising' ) 2020/7/4 Global

headlines.shortLinkText: Saka's first PL goal helps Arsenal to 2-0 win

headlines.description: Chelsea got back to winning ways with a 3-0 victory over Watford at Stamford Bridge on Saturday night to maintain their spot in the UCL places.

video.headline: Nicol: Chelsea took advantage of a Watford side with no fight

tracking.trackingName: INET_SOC EPL FCTV (Nicol: Chelsea took advantage of a Watford side with no fight) 2020/7/4 GLOBAL

headlines.shortLinkText: Chelsea keep hold on 4th with win over Watford
